ooC: Heh, in that case, congrats.


--Megatron/Switchblade--

Megatron is jolted from his revery by this last burst of static and 
words though the ship's broadband frequency. "This is Megatron," the 
pred leader says as he quickly brings up the scanner display, and 
begins scanning whatever Flicker is trying to land. "Why should I 
give you permission to land? Why should I not just kill you now and 
be done with it?" He finishes figuring that Flicker wouldn't know 
that they Preds had finished setting up their defenses.

Off comm, "Goood Perceptor, that means we now have two missile 
turrets, two laser cannons, and 4 auto guns. Sufficient firepower 
for the moment." He turns to Quickstrike as the cobra-scorpion fuzor 
enters the control room.

"Quickstrike. Notify the rest of the Predacons that they are to 
report to the control room. We will attack the Maximals soon 
enough." Megatron goes back to his scan, which has just finished. He 
examines the offensive/defensive capabilites that the scanners were 
able to detect. (your queue Kyle, I dunno how much horsepower the 
car that Flicker is driving has ^^)

-----------------------------------

The flickering pulse of a laser welder casts an erie glow around 
Switchblade's lab. The small black bot hadn't been out of the CR 
chamber long, but he had immediately noticed that further repairs 
were needed, since some of his parts were destroyed when Megatron... 
<No...> he thinks to himself as he finishes up the addition of some 
new parts to replace the old ones. Megatron was a problem which he 
couldn't deal with at the moment, so he refused to dwell on it.

Clenching and unclenching his hand, he tested out some of the new 
joints, nodding to himself as they performed admirably as his 
request. The right side of his head no longer resembled the rest of 
his head, a smooth silvery surface now covered the right side of his 
head and flared out slightly behind his head almost like a crude 
drawing of a birds wing feathers. His right eye was now surrounded 
by the silvery material, and it had a dark, enveloping, reddish glow 
instead of it's original greenish glow, which his left eye still 
had. 

His vision shifted into a red blur as he tested out the new eye. 
It's infrared capabilities were excellent, and he wondered if he had 
the capability of shortening the wavelength even more. Shrugging 
carelessly, he moves onto the next part switch. His chest plating 
had been entirely destroyed in the blast, as well as his minor 
cloaking ability. Intead of trying to make another cloaking device --
 which he didn't think he had the parts for anyway -- he had modifed 
a little thing he was working on. Something he called a Distort 
shield. Working in conjunction with two disks on his arms, it 
created a sort of protection field around him. THe only probem he 
could see with it was that even if it could block an attack, who's 
to say that the attack wouldn't have enough force to knock him 
around anyway. He hoped he didn't have to test it out in battle 
anytime soon.

Switchblade looked around his lab, and his eyes fell onto his 
pistols, which he put back into this hip ejectors, and then he sat 
down, waiting for a summons from Megatron, who would probably 
realize that the small bot would have gotten out of the CR by now.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Flicker sends another transmission.
> 
> Flicker:  I repeat we request permission to land.
>
